tier.tier-desc: An pristinely kept battle-axe with a haunted black sheen. It is rumored in legend that the souls of mortals who challenged Daggarth , the God of Malice and Strength, were entombed into this axe. If one is to listen closely enough, it is said you can hear them shriek.

tier-attributes.tier-attribute: ELAR, CRSB, BLDM, RNGR, CONJ, SORC, WIZ, SHMN, SPRT, SCT, MAGE, WAR

tier.tier-desc: This pristinely kept Two-Handed Sword has a light blue tint that scholars claim only occurs in swords forged near Glimmel Lake. It is said that cooling a sword in the lake during the forging process enchants the sword with the mystical powers of the lost lake.

This exceptionally kept Two-Handed Sword has a light blue tint that scholars claim only occurs in swords forged near Glimmel Lake. It is said that cooling a sword in the lake during the forging process enchants the sword with the mystical powers of the lost lake.

An exceptional battle-axe with a haunted black sheen. It is rumored in legend that the souls of mortals who challenged Daggarth , the God of Malice and Strength, were entombed into this axe. If one is to listen closely enough, it is said you can hear them shriek.

An old worn battle-axe with a haunted black sheen. It is rumored in legend that the souls of mortals who challenged Daggarth , the God of Malice and Strength, were entombed into this axe. If one is to listen closely enough, it is said you can hear them shriek.

An old deteriorated spear rumored to have been crafted by a tribe of nomads called the Baramorians. Special techniques known only to their tribe have made their spears extremely desired, and sought after. Sadly, none live today to recreate these masterpieces from scratch.

tier-attributes.tier-attribute: ELAR, CRSB, SPRM, RNGR, SHMN, SPRT, SCT, WAR

tier.tier-desc: An old deteriorated sword of what appears to be living embers. It is rumored that the ember blade is actually a tooth of Drulkar, the first dragon and god of fire.

tier-attributes.tier-attribute: ELAR, CRSB, KNOC, RVR, RNGR, BTLM, PLDN, SCT, WAR

tier.tier-desc: This old worn Two-Handed Sword has a light blue tint that scholars claim only occurs in swords forged near Glimmel Lake. It is said that cooling a sword in the lake during the forging process enchants the sword with the mystical powers of the lost lake.

This deteriorated Two-Handed Sword has a light blue tint that scholars claim only occurs in swords forged near Glimmel Lake. It is said that cooling a sword in the lake during the forging process enchants the sword with the mystical powers of the lost lake.

tier-attributes.tier-attribute: ELAR, CRSB, BRSK, RVR, RNGR, SCT, WAR

tier.tier-desc: An old deteriorated mace rumored to have been blessed by Brobbet himself during a time in which the gods played a more active role in the world. It is said that the wielder of this mace will feel zeal overcome them during their time of need.

tier-attributes.tier-attribute: GRDN, ELAR, CRSB, RNGR, CLRC, SHMN, SCT, HLR, WAR
